alert.note: Alert for Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:27AM EST until December 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Tioga County in central New York... Northeastern Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 900 AM EST. * At 527 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Windham, Nichols, Warren Center and West Warren. The Wappasening Creek is rapidly rising and will flood Route 187 in northeast Bradford County and areas around Windham Pennsylvania. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
